topic.title: How to manipulate Gentiles and kill their babies ?
topic.body:
Succesfull guidebook of Chabad Rabbi financed by Ministry of Education of Israel will teach modern Jews how to preserve ancient traditions of the Jews.
Unfortunately modern Jews cannot keep secrets any more that effectively like earlier so the book came in the wrong hands.
As it came publicly the Israeli government is doing like it wouldn't be exactly this what they intended.
http://www.alternet.org/story/148016/how_to_kill_goyim_and_influence_people:_israeli_rabbis_defend_book's_shocking_religious_defense_of_killing_non-jews_(with_video)
http://www.haaretz.com/news/chabad-rabbi-jews-should-kill-arab-men-women-and-children-during-war-1.277616
